# Tasklist Generator

Generate high-level tasks and gated sub-tasks from a PRD, with agent assignments, commit/PR strategy, and relevant files..

## Input
See skill documentation

## Steps

See @skills/tasklist-generator/SKILL.md for process steps.

## Output
- Format: Markdown (.md)
- Location: `docs/tasks/` (create directory if it doesn't exist)
- Filename: `tasks-[prd-file-name].md` (e.g., `tasks-0001-prd-user-profile-editing.md`)

## Reference

Use @skills/tasklist-generator/SKILL.md for detailed process documentation.
